attributes.action: Bring about a review of National and Regional Policy Requirements on Development Plan Provision for Gypsies and Travellers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like to see a more definitive set of guidelines on strategy for Local Authorities to Deliver Sites-In particular respect of the East of England Plan.....and to make better or more provision within the consultation process for the settled community (whom are potentially affected) to have a greater input in the Local Authorities Site selection Processes

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Bring about a review of National and Regional Policy Requirements on Development Plan Provision for Gypsies and Travellers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21265


Prime Minister's Office
